column4: ok i got my wifi card up in ubuntu server how do i connect to a network?
right click on the network mangler icon in the corner and see what networks show us  (ssid's)
oh well, then you are on your own. I have no idea
try googling the commands if no one steps forward with the solution.   Try http://blog.tplus1.com/index.php/2008/06/13/how-to-connect-to-a-wireless-network-from-the-ubuntu-command-line/
